description.short: Processed wood for construction and crafting.
description.full: Logs cut from the forests of the Venetian mainland and Dalmatian coast, processed into usable timber. Essential for building construction and shipbuilding.
description.flavor: The lifeblood of a maritime empire isn't gold or spice, but timberâ€”without the strength of these mainland forests, Venice would be nothing more than scattered huts upon the lagoon.
